root.name: Stop That Roach!
root.description: OverviewStop That Roach! is a puzzle game developed and published by KOEI for the game Boy in 1994. The goal of each level of Stop That Roach! is to kill or trap every roach before they reach the piece of food. Stop That Roach! features a password save system to jump back to a level. Playable Characters There are two selectable characters in Stop That Roach! whose names are Ken and Lilly. Character Select Screen
